Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Configure GitHub Pages deployment

- Add static export configuration to next.config.js
- Set basePath and assetPrefix for GitHub Pages subdirectory
- Enable unoptimized images for static export
- Fix Tailwind config duplicate ''accent'' property
- Add generateStaticParams to layout for locale routes
- Implement unstable_setRequestLocale for static rendering
- Create GitHub Actions workflow for automatic deployment
- Add .nojekyll file to prevent Jekyll processing

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Add index.html redirect to /en for GitHub Pages root

- Create index.html that redirects to /opulanzbanking/en
- Fixes 404 error when accessing root URL
- Provides fallback link if redirect fails

EOF
)")

Bash(psql "postgresql://opulanz_admin:Advensys2025?@opulanz-pg.postgres.database.azure.com:5432/postgres?sslmode=require" -c "SELECT id, type, status, payload->>''firstName'' as first_name, payload->>''lastName'' as last_name, payload->>''email'' as email, created_at FROM applications WHERE payload->>''email'' = ''toufic-jandqah@hotmail.com'' ORDER BY created_at DESC;")

Bash(psql "postgresql://opulanz_admin:Advensys2025?@opulanz-pg.postgres.database.azure.com:5432/postgres?sslmode=require" -c "ALTER TABLE applications DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS applications_type_check; ALTER TABLE applications ADD CONSTRAINT applications_type_check CHECK (type IN (''individual'', ''company'', ''accounting''));")

Bash(psql "postgresql://opulanz_admin:Advensys2025?@opulanz-pg.postgres.database.azure.com:5432/postgres?sslmode=require" -c "SELECT type, COUNT(*) as count FROM applications GROUP BY type ORDER BY type;")
Bash(for file in financial-profile-step.tsx investment-profile-step.tsx premium-payments-step.tsx beneficiaries-step.tsx compliance-declarations-step.tsx)
